DellBootSources.description: BootSources contains properties surrounding a BootSources Attribute Registry (where the system-specific BootSources attributes are described) and the Actions needed to perform changes to BootSources settings, which typically require a system reset to apply.
DellBootSources.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent BootSources attributes for a Redfish implementation.

title: #DellBootSources.DellBootSources
